name: Bluetooth-Smart Spotlight Lamp
specification:
Lighting Type: Ceiling Lights, Recessed Lights, & Panel Lights
Smart Equipment: Yes
Warranty Duration: 12 months
description:
Compatible Apple Homekit, Google Home, Alexa, Samsung SmartThings
16 million color smart lights support bright entertainment function according to music, video, game.
Power 6W 220-240V, color temperature 2000-6500K.
Remote control, timer, voice control.
Unique design, can install ceiling tiles, used for decorative tree lights or nightlights.
Zigbee and Bluetooth connection protocol.
To unlock the entire smart function requires Philips Hue Bridge.
